title: Bamilo
summary: The biggest marketplace right in the palm of your hands.
description: Bamilo is the first shopping destination you will need with the widest selection of electronics, fashion, home appliances, kids' items, and more at the best prices. Choose from hundreds of brands and thousands of products!Experience shopping at its best! Shop anywhere at any time with the convenient and secure Bamilo app. Shipping directly to your home or office and the options of paying cash on delivery makes shopping with the Bamilo app effortless. Get help with your shopping by viewing detailed product descriptions, reviews and ratings as well as special offers & deal notifications.
descriptionHTML:
Bamilo is the first shopping destination you will need with the widest selection of electronics, fashion, home appliances, kids' items, and more at the best prices. Choose from hundreds of brands and thousands of products!

Experience shopping at its best! Shop anywhere at any time with the convenient and secure Bamilo app. Shipping directly to your home or office and the options of paying cash on delivery makes shopping with the Bamilo app effortless. Get help with your shopping by viewing detailed product descriptions, reviews and ratings as well as special offers & deal notifications.

recentChanges: We carefully reviewed your all your suggestions and fix issues and provide new features based on priorities.
Now you can sign up in bamilo easier, faster and more secure
From "Order tracking" screen you can now cancel your items easily without having to call our customer support
We are waiting for your feedback and comments
